import React from 'react'; import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import MyTimer from './MyTimer'; const Product = ({product}) => { return (
{product.name} I want
sponsored by: {product.sponsor}
) } export default Product
